name: Hummy Square
description:
Hummy Square is an android game, now it realesed for PC for gamers who like to play minimalis games!

Click to screen to jump and hit sides to change your direction.

Avoid enemys and spikes, fire your bullets when time is come and,open gates with your patience!

SURVİVE!

**IMPORTANT**

Game is fitted to height for PC version.Please dont play in fullscreen mode for visual stability.

Respect!
